ygData.subject: RE: Hi Everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome!┬á I play on Innoruuk too!┬á Give me a /tell sometime and we can meet up!┬á I know some great hunting spots -┬áand you should be doing great especially
ygData.messageBody:
Welcome!´┐¢ I play on Innoruuk too!´┐¢ Give me a /tell sometime and we can meet
up!´┐¢ I know some great hunting spots -´┐¢and you should be doing great
especially in the Karanas.´┐¢ Since you are rich -´┐¢I would´┐¢guess that you´┐¢have
a good magic hitter - if not get the Dragoon Dirk.´┐¢ I´┐¢prefer it to my
combine long slasher even.´┐¢ I just made 15 and am going to have fun with the
new lullaby song.´┐¢
´┐¢
Playing 2 or more songs at the same time - can be a great value.´┐¢ Remember
that not only do you get the effects but everyone in your group gets them
too.´┐¢ So if one is good two is twice as good!´┐¢ The Anthem de Arms is a super
buff and stacks well with the Hymm of Restoration.´┐¢ Every now and then I
like to let loose with´┐¢a great bellow just for the fun of seeing the monstie
reel with pain!
´┐¢
At some point in our careers, we get the chance to satnd off and provide our
services with our instruments equipped and aviod the melee.´┐¢ I am anxious to
try that out myself but i think you need to have a poarty of regulars who
understand what you are doing.´┐¢ Then seeing instrument equipped song effect
and two or more playing at the same time should be really great.
´┐¢
Sylly - the bard!
´┐¢
p.s. we should get Cunobel and Harmonic - a 4 bard party - now that would be
great!´┐¢ Hmm Roofus and Sinatrah too! Awesome!

-----Original Message-----
From: Samian [mailto:samian@...]
Sent: Saturday, July 10, 1999 1:41 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Hi Everyone


´┐¢´┐¢´┐¢ I just joined the mailing and wanted to say hey to everyone. I play on
the Innoruuk server and have just reached lvl 12. Even though I've been a
bard for a while now, I still have many questions. First off, I hear about
how people can twist songs to get multiple effects. At what point does this
become a part of everyday bard life? Right now, it works, but I guess I'm
just not used to it because I hardly ever see the use. Also, for soloing,
what are two good songs to stack at my lvl?I can get to working on my
stacking skill. :)
´┐¢´┐¢´┐¢ Also, I have a secret for all of my fellow bards. Do pottery. Make pie
tins until you puke. Right now, at lvl 12, I have a complete set of bronze
armor and 250pp in the bank all because I make pie tins and sell them to NPC
Merchants. Halas is the best place to do it´┐¢because everything you need is
in one zone and close together. Seriously, give it a try. You will not be
disappointed.
´┐¢
Samian
